message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be of great value to you.  To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your perspective, however, I believe the product's value is closer to my initial offer.  Could we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $9,500 is a more reasonable price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about we try $10,000?
